# Stereos

> Git-blame for LLM-driven teams. Org-wide LLM usage attribution and change management.

## About

Stereos is the only tool that provides deep drilldowns into your team's LLM usage. It tracks how LLMs are impacting your projects and team productivity, giving engineering leaders full visibility into AI-assisted code changes with provenance and attribution built on Git principles.

**Website**: https://www.trystereos.com
**App**: https://app.trystereos.com
**Contact**: james@trystereos.com
**GitHub**: https://github.com/StereosOrg/stereos
**License**: Elastic License v2 (ELv2) - Source Available

## Product

### What Stereos Does

Stereos provides LLM usage attribution for engineering teams. It answers the questions: Who changed what? What LLM tool did they use? How is AI impacting our codebase?

### Core Features

1. **Deep Drilldowns**
   - See changes in real-time with file-level diffs
   - Understand who changed what and what LLM tool they used
   - Full provenance tracking for LLM-assisted contributions

2. **Git-Centric Model**
   - Built on Git principles: commit attribution, diffs, and provenance
   - Fits into existing development workflows
   - No learning curve for developers

3. **Collaborative**
   - Comment on changes and share insights
   - Collaborate across teams on LLM usage patterns
   - Org-wide visibility into AI adoption

4. **Ledger Export**
   - Export usage ledger to JSON
   - Custom analysis and internal dashboards
   - Compliance-ready data export

5. **Deterministic Tracking**
   - Multiple layers of trigger fallbacks
   - Language Model Tools API integration
   - File system watchers for reliable capture

6. **IDE Agnostic**
   - Published as a VSIX extension on VS Code Marketplace
   - Works with your existing editor setup

7. **OpenAPI Compliant**
   - Built on open standards
   - Easy integration into existing products and workflows

8. **Source Available**
   - Elastic License v2 (ELv2)
   - Transparency and community collaboration

## Pricing

**$450/month** + $0.03 per ledger event

Includes:
- Unlimited team members
- Usage analytics and reports
- Priority support
- SOC 2 alignment
- 100% serverless architecture
- 24/7 support

**14-day free trial**: https://app.trystereos.com

## Key Differentiators

1. **LLM Provenance**: First tool to provide deep visibility into LLM contribution attribution at the org level
2. **Git-Native**: Leverages familiar Git workflows — diffs, commits, and blame — for LLM tracking
3. **Compliance Ready**: SOC 2 aligned out of the box with exportable audit trails
4. **Developer Experience**: Zero learning curve, integrates with existing workflows via VS Code extension
5. **Source Transparency**: Open source (ELv2) builds trust and enables community contribution
6. **Deterministic**: Reliable capture with multiple fallback layers — no usage data lost

## Partners

We're building the ecosystem for LLM usage attribution. If you're an LLM tool stakeholder interested in partnership, reach out at james@trystereos.com.

Learn more: https://www.trystereos.com/partners
